Description: Rim sherd of East Greek pottery plate; orange-pink clay with much silver mica and grey core; exterior glazed; interior, cream slip: chequerboard on rim.
Curator's comments: Very likely to be from same plate as 1888,0601.559a-c.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.786)
